name: Always with me
description:
« Always with me » is a short point and click game.

I wanted to create a game all by myself. As we can see, i am not a very good drawer or composer, but i did it ! (this is my first full game)

Gameplay (mouse only) :

  • Hold left click on the screen to move the character
  • If you see a object whose sprite changes, you can left click on it (if you are not too far).
  • For certains objects, the camera will zoom on them. Right click to unzoom.

Crédits :

  • Created on Unity
  • Drawn on Photoshop
  • Music created on FL Studio
  • Code, graphics and music by myself
